item.title: FBI searching former Trump adviser John Bolton's home
item.description: Federal agents were seen Friday morning searching the Maryland residence of former Trump national security adviser John Bolton, ABC News has learned.

item.title: Lyle Menendez set for parole board hearing day after brother was denied
item.description: A panel denied Erik Menendez, Lyle's brother, parole after a 10-hour hearing on Thursday.

item.title: Fed Chair Powell says inflation, hiring slowdown pose 'challenging situation'
item.description: Eight months have elapsed since the Fed last adjusted interest rates.

item.title: AP analysis shows Texas and California redistricting efforts could mess with rare partisan balance
item.description: Moves by Texas Republicans and California Democrats to redraw their U.S. House districts could disrupt a rare partisan balance in American politics.
